message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I am only able to pay up to $180 for it.
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $210.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $190 for the product.
I'm getting closer to your price, Bob, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $200. Let me know if that works for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your efforts in negotiating. I would like to counter with an offer of $195 for the product.
I'm getting close to the sweet spot, Bob. I can offer it to you for $205. This is my final offer, so let me know if it works for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offers. I would like to counter with an offer of $200 for the product.
